body: Please consider relocating the "Incomplete" directory out of the data ("Magarena") directory since it not actually distributed with each new release.
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Relocate "Incomplete" directory.

comments.body:
I think it's there just for ease of moving files to a nearby folder - With the inclusion of the scripts_missing folder, this won't be getting as much use as it used to.

Most of the cards here are the MagicCardList-type cards: Scry 2+, 'Looking at' cards, 'Up to' cards, and also multi-target.
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)

comments.body: I'll have a trawl through the incomplete folder, may be able to pull some out
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)

comments.body: I am not saying you should delete it, just move it to a more appropriate directory. I just think it would be clearer and cleaner if the "Magarena" directory in source mirrored the same directory in a released version as much as possible.
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)

comments.body: I agree, just as it's not been used for a while, I thought it could do with a bit of a tidy-up.
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)

comments.body:
fixed in https://bitbucket.org/lodici/magarena/commits/8d29726d734480546ad337413ae11094757636ba .

I have relocated "Incomplete" to the source root directory (where you can find other hard to classify directories, like "cards", "exp" and "grammar").

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
